sniEisaSlots.name: sniEisaSlots
sniEisaSlots.description: Number of eisa slots in the system. 0 if no EISA-Bus present.

sniIsaSlots.name: sniIsaSlots
sniIsaSlots.description: Number of isa slots in the system. 0 if no ISA-Bus present.

sniPciSlots.name: sniPciSlots
sniPciSlots.description: Number of pci slots in the system. 0 if no PCI-Bus present.

sniFunctionTable.name: sniFunctionTable
sniFunctionTable.description: Table of all common data for all functions

sniBusIndex.name: sniBusIndex
sniBusIndex.description: Index of the bus based on 1

sniDeviceTypeName.name: sniDeviceTypeName
sniDeviceTypeName.description: type of device in readable form

sniDeviceName.name: sniDeviceName
sniDeviceName.description: Operating system independent name of device in readable form

sniVendorName.name: sniVendorName
sniVendorName.description: manufacturer of the device in readable form

sniPhysicalSlotNo.name: sniPhysicalSlotNo
sniPhysicalSlotNo.description: indicates the physical slot the device resides in (0: onboard device, -1: not available)

sniAdapterSpecificData.name: sniAdapterSpecificData
sniAdapterSpecificData.description: Specific data for this adapter. Currently the only information defined is the MAC address for lan adapters.

sniOsDeviceName.name: sniOsDeviceName
sniOsDeviceName.description: Operating system specific display name for the device

sniPhysicalSlotDesignation.name: sniPhysicalSlotDesignation
sniPhysicalSlotDesignation.description: Designation of the physical slot where the device is plugged in

sniCompLocationKey.name: sniCompLocationKey
sniCompLocationKey.description: Device location key, used for identifying the component; e.g. 'TYPE_PCI&BUS_3&DEV_14&FUNC_0'

sniEisaFunctionTable.name: sniEisaFunctionTable
sniEisaFunctionTable.description: Table of all eisa function entries

sniEisaBusIndex.name: sniEisaBusIndex
sniEisaBusIndex.description: Index of the bus based on 1

sniEisaConfigurationComplete.name: sniEisaConfigurationComplete
sniEisaConfigurationComplete.description: True if board is completely configured

sniEisaType.name: sniEisaType
sniEisaType.description: Type and subtype as ASCII string

sniEisaValid.name: sniEisaValid
sniEisaValid.description: True, if the slot contains a correctly configured eisa board.

sniEisaId.name: sniEisaId
sniEisaId.description: The eisa id of the board.

sniPciFunctionTable.name: sniPciFunctionTable
sniPciFunctionTable.description: Table of all pci function entries

sniPciBusIndex.name: sniPciBusIndex
sniPciBusIndex.description: Index of the bus based on 1

sniPciVendorId.name: sniPciVendorId
sniPciVendorId.description: Identifies the manufacturer of the device. This must be a value allocated by the PCI SIG.

sniPciDeviceId.name: sniPciDeviceId
sniPciDeviceId.description: Identifies the particular device. This value is assigned by the manufacturer.

sniPciRevisionId.name: sniPciRevisionId
sniPciRevisionId.description: Specifies the revision level of the device described by sniPciDeviceId. This value is assigned by the manufacturer.

sniPciBaseClass.name: sniPciBaseClass
sniPciBaseClass.description: Identifies type of the device, according to the PCI classification scheme.

sniPciSubClass.name: sniPciSubClass
sniPciSubClass.description: Identifies the subtype, if any, of the device, according to the PCI classification scheme.

sniPciProgIf.name: sniPciProgIf
sniPciProgIf.description: Identifies the register-level programming interface, if any, for the device, according to the PCI classification scheme.

sniPciBuiltInSelfTest.name: sniPciBuiltInSelfTest
sniPciBuiltInSelfTest.description: Indicates if the device does support built-in self test.

sniPciInterruptPin.name: sniPciInterruptPin
sniPciInterruptPin.description: Indicates which interrupt pin the PCI device uses.

sniPciInterruptLine.name: sniPciInterruptLine
sniPciInterruptLine.description: Indicates the input of the system interrupt controller that the interrupt pin is connected to.

sniPciSpecificData.name: sniPciSpecificData
sniPciSpecificData.description: This is device specific data found in the COMMON CONFIGURATION SPACE. This field is currently not used and therefor filled with zeros.

sniPciSecondaryBusIndex.name: sniPciSecondaryBusIndex
sniPciSecondaryBusIndex.description: Valid only for a bridge device. This is the index of the bridge's secondary bus (-1 = no bus index available; ignore this field).

sniPciSecondaryBusType.name: sniPciSecondaryBusType
sniPciSecondaryBusType.description: Valid only for a bridge device. This is the type of the bridge's secondary bus. Following values are defined (according to PCI Local bus specification, Revision 2.1, values are incremented by 1): 00h: Unknown value; ignore this field 01h: Host bridge (bridge to CPU bus) 02h: ISA bridge 03h: EISA bridge 04h: MCA bridge 05h: PCI-to-PCI bridge 06h: PCMCIA bridge 07h: NuBus bridge 80h: Other bridge device

sniPciSubVendorId.name: sniPciSubVendorId
sniPciSubVendorId.description: Identifies the particular device. This value is assigned by the manufacturer.

sniPciSubDeviceId.name: sniPciSubDeviceId
sniPciSubDeviceId.description: Identifies the particular device. This value is assigned by the manufacturer.

sniMemBusIndex.name: sniMemBusIndex
sniMemBusIndex.description: Index of the bus based on 1

sniMemSlotDevice.name: sniMemSlotDevice
sniMemSlotDevice.description: Slot or Device number based on 0

sniBusMemoryStart.name: sniBusMemoryStart
sniBusMemoryStart.description: Start address (low DWORD part) of shared memory or 0 if not used

sniBusMemoryLength.name: sniBusMemoryLength
sniBusMemoryLength.description: Length of shared memory or 0 if not used

sniBusMemoryStartHigh.name: sniBusMemoryStartHigh
sniBusMemoryStartHigh.description: Start address (high DWORD part) of shared memory or 0 if not used

sniIntBusIndex.name: sniIntBusIndex
sniIntBusIndex.description: Index of the bus based on 1

sniIntSlotDevice.name: sniIntSlotDevice
sniIntSlotDevice.description: Slot or Device number based on 0

sniBusInterruptUsed.name: sniBusInterruptUsed
sniBusInterruptUsed.description: True if and only if not unknown and an interrupt is used

sniBusInterruptShared.name: sniBusInterruptShared
sniBusInterruptShared.description: True if and only if not unknown and an interrupt is shared

sniDMABusIndex.name: sniDMABusIndex
sniDMABusIndex.description: Index of the bus based on 1

sniDMASlotDevice.name: sniDMASlotDevice
sniDMASlotDevice.description: Slot or Device number based on 0

sniPortBusIndex.name: sniPortBusIndex
sniPortBusIndex.description: Index of the bus based on 1

sniPortSlotDevice.name: sniPortSlotDevice
sniPortSlotDevice.description: Slot or Device number based on 0

sniBusIOPortShared.name: sniBusIOPortShared
sniBusIOPortShared.description: True if io port is shared

sniBusComponentTable.name: sniBusComponentTable
sniBusComponentTable.description: Table of all common data for all functions

sniBusCompBusType.name: sniBusCompBusType
sniBusCompBusType.description: Type of the bus (ISA, EISA, PCI)

sniBusCompBusNumber.name: sniBusCompBusNumber
sniBusCompBusNumber.description: Bus number for the specified bus type (1..n)

sniBusCompDeviceNo.name: sniBusCompDeviceNo
sniBusCompDeviceNo.description: Device number (PCI) or slot number (ISA, EISA)

sniBusCompDeviceName.name: sniBusCompDeviceName
sniBusCompDeviceName.description: Vendor and device name in readable form

sniBusCompEisaPciId.name: sniBusCompEisaPciId
sniBusCompEisaPciId.description: EISA ID for EISA components, PCI vendor/device ID for PCI components (hexadecimal notation)

svPciFunctionTable.name: svPciFunctionTable
svPciFunctionTable.description: Table of all pci function entries

svPciBusIndex.name: svPciBusIndex
svPciBusIndex.description: Index of the bus based on 1

svPciVendorId.name: svPciVendorId
svPciVendorId.description: Identifies the manufacturer of the device. This must be a value allocated by the PCI SIG.

svPciSubVendorId.name: svPciSubVendorId
svPciSubVendorId.description: Identifies the particular device. This value is assigned by the manufacturer.

svPciDeviceId.name: svPciDeviceId
svPciDeviceId.description: Identifies the particular device. This value is assigned by the manufacturer.

svPciSubDeviceId.name: svPciSubDeviceId
svPciSubDeviceId.description: Identifies the particular device. This value is assigned by the manufacturer.

svPciRevisionId.name: svPciRevisionId
svPciRevisionId.description: Specifies the revision level of the device described by svPciDeviceId. This value is assigned by the manufacturer.

svPciBaseClass.name: svPciBaseClass
svPciBaseClass.description: Identifies type of the device, according to the PCI classification scheme.

svPciSubClass.name: svPciSubClass
svPciSubClass.description: Identifies the subtype, if any, of the device, according to the PCI classification scheme.

svPciProgIf.name: svPciProgIf
svPciProgIf.description: Identifies the register-level programming interface, if any, for the device, according to the PCI classification scheme.

svPciBuiltInSelfTest.name: svPciBuiltInSelfTest
svPciBuiltInSelfTest.description: Indicates if the device does support built-in self test.

svPciInterruptPin.name: svPciInterruptPin
svPciInterruptPin.description: Indicates which interrupt pin the PCI device uses.

svPciInterruptLine.name: svPciInterruptLine
svPciInterruptLine.description: Indicates the input of the system interrupt controller that the interrupt pin is connected to.

svPciSpecificData.name: svPciSpecificData
svPciSpecificData.description: This is device specific data found in the COMMON CONFIGURATION SPACE. This field is currently not used and therefor filled with zeros.

svPciSecondaryBusIndex.name: svPciSecondaryBusIndex
svPciSecondaryBusIndex.description: Valid only for a bridge device. This is the index of the bridge's secondary bus (-1 = no bus index available; ignore this field).

svPciSecondaryBusType.name: svPciSecondaryBusType
svPciSecondaryBusType.description: Valid only for a bridge device. This is the type of the bridge's secondary bus. Following values are defined (according to PCI Local bus specification, Revision 2.1, values are incremented by 1): 00h: Unknown value; ignore this field 01h: Host bridge (bridge to CPU bus) 02h: ISA bridge 03h: EISA bridge 04h: MCA bridge 05h: PCI-to-PCI bridge 06h: PCMCIA bridge 07h: NuBus bridge 80h: Other bridge device

svPciDeviceName.name: svPciDeviceName
svPciDeviceName.description: Operating system independent name of device in readable form

svPciAdapterUniqueId.name: svPciAdapterUniqueId
svPciAdapterUniqueId.description: Unigue adapter type specific ID. MAC address for lan adapters. WWN for fibre channel adapters. Otherwise empty.

svPciPhysicalSlotDesignation.name: svPciPhysicalSlotDesignation
svPciPhysicalSlotDesignation.description: Designation of the physical slot where the device is plugged in

svPciCompLocationKey.name: svPciCompLocationKey
svPciCompLocationKey.description: Unique device location key, used for identifying the component; e.g. 'TYPE_PCI&BUS_3&DEV_14&FUNC_0' or 'TYPE_PCI&BUS_3&DEV_14&FUNC_0&SEG_1'
